Osejs.Information.Title: Ejs Open Source Multi Objects (Car,Ball,Shell,Disc) rolling down inclined plane
Osejs.Information.Abstract:
Ejs Open Source Multi Objects (Car,Ball,Shell,Disc) rolling down inclined plane
Ejs Open Source Rocket Car on an Inclined Plane Java Applet lookang thanks Fu-Kwun Hwang for all the learning in designing the lab
Osejs.Information.Author: Wolfgang Christian, Francisco Esquembre, and Mario Belloni , remixed by lookang (weelookang@gmail.com)

Variable.Name: bodyMass
Variable.Comment: mass of the car (for a car size of 1)

Variable.Name: bodyR
Variable.Comment: for mode to disc and ball

Variable.Name: fwR
Variable.Comment: front wheel radius (for a car size of 1)

Variable.Name: fwMass
Variable.Comment: front wheel mass (for a car size of 1)

Variable.Name: rwR
Variable.Comment: rear wheel radius (for a car size of 1)

Variable.Name: rwMass
Variable.Comment: rear wheel mass (for a car size of 1)

Variable.Name: initX
Variable.Comment: initial distance to the bottom-right corner (-L+carSize/2)/Math.cos(angle)

Variable.Name: trMessage
Variable.Value: "Drag the mass to position it and click play"

Variable.Name: dt
Variable.Comment: increment of time change to 0.05 by lookang to overcomes cases of car passing bumper right through

Variable.Name: TM
Variable.Comment: total mass assume car has 1 body 2 forward 2 rear wheels

Variable.Name: I
Variable.Comment: I = moment of inertia of standard object

EventContent.ZeroCondition: if (v>0) return xbumperbottom-(x+carSize/2); // bounced at x=xmax else if(v<0)return xbumpertop-(x-carSize/2); // bounced at x=xmin or x+carSize/2 //return 1.0; // time will stop if use return 1.0 return 0; // time continues

Osejs.View.Creation.Element.Property: "length of the track along the angle"
"length of the track along the angle"
"x position of the object along the direction of angle"
"x position of the object along the direction of angle"
"rear wheel mass, need to assume that are 2 wheels for calculation purposes"
"rear wheel mass, need to assume that are 2 wheels for calculation purposes"
"forward wheel mass, need to assume that are 2 wheels for calculation purposes"
"forward wheel mass, need to assume that are 2 wheels for calculation purposes"
"forward wheel mass, need to assume that are 2 wheels for calculation purposes"
"coefficient of restitution between mass and bumpers"
"coefficient of restitution between mass and bumpers"
"Resets the simulation to its default state."
